verses.t: And I{G2504}, brethren{G80}, when I came{G2064} to{G4314} you{G5209}, came{G2064} not{G3756} with{G2596} excellency{G5247} of speech{G3056} or{G2228} of wisdom{G4678}, declaring{G2605} unto you{G5213} the testimony{G3588} of God{G3588}.
For{G1063} I determined{G2919} not{G3756} to know{G1492} any thing{G5100} among{G1722} you{G5213}, save{G1487} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, and{G2532} him{G5126} crucified{G4717}.
And{G2532} I{G1473} was{G1096} with{G4314} you{G5209} in{G1722} weakness{G769}, and{G2532} in{G1722} fear{G5401}, and{G2532} in{G1722} much{G4183} trembling{G5156}.

And{G2532} my{G3450} speech{G3588} and{G2532} my{G3450} preaching{G3588} was not{G3756} with{G1722} enticing{G3981} words{G3056} of man's{G442} wisdom{G4678}, but{G235} in{G1722} demonstration{G585} of the Spirit{G4151} and{G2532} of power{G1411}:
That{G2443} your{G5216} faith{G3588} should not{G3361} stand{G5600} in{G1722} the wisdom{G4678} of men{G444}, but{G235} in{G1722} the power{G1411} of God{G2316}.

Howbeit{G1161} we speak{G2980} wisdom{G4678} among{G1722} them{G3588} that are perfect{G5046}: yet{G1161} not{G3756} the wisdom{G4678} of this{G5127} world{G3588}, nor{G3761} of the princes{G3588} of this{G5127} world{G3588}, that{G3588} come to nought{G2673}:

But{G235} we speak{G2980} the wisdom{G4678} of God{G2316} in{G1722} a mystery{G3466}, even the hidden{G613} wisdom, which{G3739} God{G3588} ordained{G4309} before{G4253} the world{G3588} unto{G1519} our{G2257} glory{G1391}:

Which{G3739} none{G3762} of the princes{G3588} of this{G5127} world{G3588} knew{G1097}: for{G1063} had{G1487} they known{G1097} it, they would{G4717} not{G3756} have{G302} crucified{G4717} the Lord{G3588} of glory{G3588}.

But{G235} as{G2531} it is written{G1125}, Eye{G3788} hath{G1492} not{G3756} seen{G1492}, nor{G2532} ear{G3775} heard{G191}, neither{G2532} have entered{G305} into{G1909} the heart{G2588} of man{G444}, the things which{G3739} God{G3588} hath prepared{G2090} for them{G3588} that love{G25} him{G846}.

But{G1161} God{G3588} hath revealed{G601} them unto us{G2254} by{G1223} his{G846} Spirit{G3588}: for{G1063} the Spirit{G4151} searcheth{G2045} all things{G3956}, yea{G2532}, the deep things{G3588} of God{G3588}.

For{G1063} what{G5101} man{G444} knoweth{G1492} the things{G3588} of a man{G3588}, save{G1487} the spirit{G3588} of man{G3588} which is{G3588} in{G1722} him{G846}? even{G2532} so{G3779} the things{G3588} of God{G3588} knoweth{G1492} no man{G3762}, but{G1487} the Spirit{G3588} of God{G3588}.

Now{G1161} we{G2249} have received{G2983}, not{G3756} the spirit{G3588} of the world{G3588}, but{G235} the spirit{G3588} which is{G3588} of{G1537} God{G3588}; that{G2443} we might know{G1492} the things that{G3588} are freely given{G5483} to us{G2254} of{G5259} God{G3588}.

Which things{G3739} also{G2532} we speak{G2980}, not{G3756} in{G1722} the words{G3056} which man's{G442} wisdom{G4678} teacheth{G1318}, but{G235} which{G1722} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} teacheth{G1318}; comparing{G4793} spiritual things{G4152} with spiritual{G4152}.

But{G1161} the natural{G5591} man{G444} receiveth{G1209} not{G3756} the things{G3588} of the Spirit{G3588} of God{G3588}: for{G1063} they are{G2076} foolishness{G3472} unto him{G846}: neither{G3756} can{G1410} he know{G1097} them, because{G3754} they are spiritually{G4153} discerned{G350}.
But{G1161} he that{G3588} is spiritual{G4152} judgeth{G350} all things{G3956}, yet{G1161} he himself{G846} is judged{G350} of{G5259} no man{G3762}.
For{G1063} who{G5101} hath known{G1097} the mind{G3563} of the Lord{G2962}, that{G3739} he may instruct{G4822} him{G846}? But{G1161} we{G2249} have{G2192} the mind{G3563} of Christ{G5547}.
